title: Round the Twist
creator_credit: The Australian Children's Television Foundation, Ray Boseley and Tammy Burnstock
brief_description: Round the Twist is a Logie Award-winning Australian children’s television series about three children and their father who live in a lighthouse and become involved in many bizarre magical adventures.

constellations_other.name: Learning through play
constellations_other.description: Alexander Stitt and Bruce Weatherheadâ€™s Zoetrope to Cinemascope educated children about the moving image through posters, cut-outs, puzzles and games, but moving image works have also been used to educate and entertain kids about all aspects of life.
